17 June 2014 08:30:02 AM

TOMS743_PRB
  C version
  Test the TOMS743 library.

  Number of bits in mantissa - 1 = 52

TEST01
  Compare WAPR(X) to stored values.

TEST02
  Input X is the offset from -exp(-1).
  Both branches of the W function will be checked.

  Results for Wp(x):

   Offset x    W(x) (WAPR)     W(x) (BISECT)  Digits Correct

   1.00000000e-09  -9.99926269e-01  -9.99926269e-01       14
